scripts.start:dev-api-autocannon: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only dev-autocannon
scripts.start:dev-api: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only dev
scripts.start:dev-bullmq: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only bullmq-worker-dev
scripts.start:dev-cron: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only cron-worker-dev
scripts.start:dev-rabbitmq: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only rabbitmq-worker-dev
scripts.start:dev-kafka: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only kafka-worker-dev
scripts.start:dev-pusher: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only pusher-worker-dev
scripts.start:prod-api: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only prod
scripts.start:prod-bullmq: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only bullmq-worker
scripts.start:prod-cron: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only cron-worker
scripts.start:prod-rabbitmq: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only rabbitmq-worker
scripts.start:prod-kafka: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only kafka-worker
scripts.start:prod-pusher: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only pusher-worker
scripts.pm2:stop:all: pm2 stop all && pm2 delete all
scripts.start:dev:clean: npm run stop:all && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:prod:clean: npm run stop:all && npm run start:prod
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsoa:spec-and-routes && npx tsc && tsc-alias && swc src -d dist --source-maps --copy-files
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run build:tsc && swc src -d dist --source-maps --copy-files
scripts.build:tsc: npm run prettier && npm run tsoa:spec-and-routes && tsc && tsc-alias
scripts.dev: npm run tsoa:spec-and-routes && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec 'node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register' src/server.ts
scripts.dev:api: npm run tsoa:spec-and-routes && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec 'node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register' src/server.ts
scripts.dev:cron: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9230 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/cronJob/index.ts
scripts.dev:bullmq: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9231 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/bullMq/index.ts
scripts.dev:rabbitmq: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9232 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/rabbitMq/index.ts
scripts.dev:kafka: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9233 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/kafka/index.ts
scripts.dev:pusher: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9234 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/pusher/index.ts
scripts.debug:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec 'node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register' src/server.ts
scripts.debug:cron: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9230 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/cronJob/index.ts
scripts.debug:bullmq: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9231 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/bullMq/index.ts
scripts.debug:rabbitmq: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9232 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/rabbitMq/index.ts
scripts.debug:kafka: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9233 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/kafka/index.ts
scripts.debug:pusher: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9234 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/pusher/index.ts
scripts.debug:all-workers: concurrently -k -n cron,bullmq,rabbitmq,kafka,pusher -c yellow,cyan,magenta,green,blue "npm run debug:cron" "npm run debug:bullmq" "npm run debug:rabbitmq" "npm run debug:kafka" "npm run debug:pusher"
